ygData.subject: RE: Gypsy Lute Fun
ygData.msgSnippet: I know I can be cryptic at times but I thought that was pretty clear: only 2 of the 8 people there had any interest in the drums (even though I told em they
ygData.messageBody:
I know I can be cryptic at times but I thought that was pretty clear:

"only 2 of the 8 people there had any interest in the drums"

(even though I told em they can be sold for maybe 500pp)

The group leader said, "ok, anyone who wants to /random 1 100 highest number
wins."

only 2 people rolled

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 12, 2000 12:03 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Gypsy Lute Fun

From: <kim@...>

On Wed, 12 Jan 2000, James Schuldes wrote:
>
> rushed her. We killed her and she forked over some drums
(only 2 of the 8
> had any interest so they randomed and the necro's bard
twink is now very
> nicely twinked.)

Double ack! Even in pickup groups, most folks allow people
to
lotto for their secondaries only if none of the people there
can use/want the item.
